name: Skyfear - Tech Demo
description:
Skyfear is a ferocious evolution of combat with a dark vision. Fight across prehistoric lands as a wyvern, dismember your foes, and rise to the tyrant status of the mountains. Create your own wyvern and build up perks, abilities, and magic to play with your own style.

Battle AI in our free [early] tech demo from 2017!

Join our Discord server: Skyfear on Discord

Submitting a donation when downloading helps us run the studio and fund projects like this. Alternatively, we accept:

BTC: 3AgxujpQrXYHwYpYzJ7Wvjgqg5EBfhxjZ6

Silver (email protoriastudios@gmail.com)

Minimum system requirements (Tech demo):

4GB RAM, GTX 750ti or greater

2.5GB HDD space

Note: Because this is a demo representing a WORK IN PROGRESS, video and control preferences/settings are limited. Some material may not work as usually intended.

Developed by Protoria Studios

Published by Protoria Studios
